Inter::CompensatedPair< BarePair, LinkPotential > Class Template Reference

Detailed Description

template<class BarePair, class LinkPotential>
class Inter::CompensatedPair< BarePair, LinkPotential >

Compensated pair potential for transient gel.

This class is intended for use in a model with transient crosslinks that can be created or destroyed at fixed chemical potential.

Definition at line 32 of file CompensatedPair.h.

#include <CompensatedPair.h>

Definition at line 284 of file CompensatedPair.h.

template<class BarePair , class LinkPotential >
double Inter::CompensatedPair< BarePair, LinkPotential >::forceOverR ( double  rsq,
int  i,
int  j 
) const [inline]

Returns ratio of scalar pair interaction force to pair separation.

Multiply this quantity by the components of the separation vector to obtain the force vector. A positive value for the return value represents a repulsive force between a pair of particles.

Parameters:
rsqsquare of distance between particles
itype of particle 1
jtype of particle 2
Returns:
force divided by distance
